titleStmt.title: The declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in the Parliament of England, sent to His Majesties Privie Councell of Scotland With His Majesties message to His Majesties said Councell there, upon that occasion. And His Majesties other letter to his said Councell of the 29. of December.
Proceedings. 1642-12-06.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the Cambridge University Library and the Trinity College (University of Cambridge) Library (defective copy).
